results.title: Sergei Eisenstein 1898-1948
results.creator_credit: Moscow Central Studio of Documentary Films
results.brief_description: This film biography deals with the life and work of the classic Russian director, Sergei Mikhailovitch Eisenstein, 1989-1948. Extracts from some of his best known films including “Potemkin”, “Old and New”, “Ten Days that Shook the World” and “Ivan the Terrible”. Homage is paid to the director by Sergei Prokofiev, Gregori Alexandrov and Guiseppe de Santis.

results.title: Sentences, number line
results.brief_description: This film analyses word problems and associated number sentences. The number line is used to represent sets of admissible solutions under various operations. (Teacher education)

results.title: Sense of home: getting older in a new country
results.creator_credit: Brian Rapsey, Rhapsody Pictures and St George Migrant Resource Centre
results.brief_description: Isis Hanna (Egyptian), Sammy Kwong (Chinese), Stavroula Pikros (Greek) are three elderly Australians. All emigrated to Australia, but at different times in Australia’s migration history. This documentary shares their stories and explores the effect of cultural difference and assimilation. They talk openly about aging in a foreign country ‘when home is no longer home’ and what they plan for the future. All subjects of the documentary have been part of a special program in Sydney at St. George Migrant Resource Centre designed for elderly migrants. Once a week each migrant group gets together to share a meal, socialise and tell stories.

results.title: Semiconductor physics. Part 5. The Transistor
results.creator_credit: Eric Wylam, Hindle Marriott Edgar and World Wide Animation
results.brief_description: An explanation of the behaviour of a two-junction (p-n-p) semiconductor device and the necessity for a thin base region, concluding with an explanation of the amplifying action of a transistor. Intended for technical colleges and universities

results.title: Semi-conductors. Part II. Low frequency amplification
results.brief_description: Shows the fundamentals of low frequency amplification; electron and hole flow, F-N junction characteristics and transistor symbols; build up of amplifying circuits; an analysis of the operation of the common emitter and common base circuit.

results.title: Selection of Your Horse
results.brief_description: In this program Captain Mark Phillips enables you, the prospective purchaser to determine your requirements in a saddle horse and shows you how to look for a suitable animal. He explains in clear terms the individual attributes of a horse that are important to you to consider and pays particular attention to the following areas: (1) Conformation, (2) Soundness, (3) Temperament, (4) Performance under saddle, (5) Dangers and pitfalls and how to avoid them, (6) Veterinary report and how to evaluate it.

results.title: Seeds in the wind
results.creator_credit: Paul Carpita and Triangle Film Productions
results.brief_description:
The boy decides to wag school because of a punishment given to him the previous day. He spends the time wandering around the docks smoking, thinking up excuses for his teacher, watching the loading and unloading of ships, standing, dwarfed in a drydock, hoping to fulfil his ambition to leave school and become apprenticed to one of the people he is watching - the welders, the painters, the carpenters.
En glish adaptation by Peter Graham.

results.title: See Britain
results.brief_description: A travelogue of famous beauty spots and places of interest in England. The camera visits London, Salisbury and the university town of Cambridge, travels through Lincolnshire, then goes to the rocky coast of Devon and Cornwall which charm the visitor with their unique beauty.

results.title: Security Is Everybodys Business
results.brief_description: Substance abuse, theft of drugs for re-sale, accidental injury, mugging, kidnapping and theft of records are some of the security and safety problems that occur in hospitals. This video, aimed particularly at health care workers, outlines precautions that may be taken to prevent these occurrences.

results.title: Security and the law
results.creator_credit: Andrew Costikyan, Jon J. Conrad and Security Films
results.brief_description: Security officers undertake tasks similar to police and often present themselves in a similar fashion. However they do not have the legal authority of police. This film presents the American perspective on: security officer operations; differences in the types of crime (as designated by law); arrest procedures; weapons and the use of force; and incident reporting.
